original_text: One Sabbath Jesus was going through the grainfields, and his disciples began to pick some heads of grain, rub them in their hands and eat the kernels.
korean_text: 안식일에 예수께서 밀밭 사이로 지나가실새 제자들이 이삭을 잘라 손으로 비비어 먹으니

sentences.original_text: One Sabbath Jesus was going through the grainfields
sentences.korean_translation: 안식일에 예수님은 곡식 밭을 지나가고 계셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and his disciples began to pick some heads of grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제자들이 곡식 이삭을 뜯기 시작했습니다
